meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cheap or stingy.
meanings.sent1: The chintziness of the fabric was evident in its thin material and dull colors.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her chintziness when it came to buying gifts for others.
meanings.sent3: His chintziness reached new heights when he reused tea bags multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The chintziness of his excuses for not contributing to the team was transparent to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The chintziness of the landlord was reflected in the peeling paint and broken fixtures.

meanings.definition: A tendency to be overly frugal or miserly.
meanings.sent1: Despite his wealth, his chintziness led him to haggle over every small expense.
meanings.sent2: Her chintziness often clashed with her friends' more generous nature.
meanings.sent3: The chintziness of the billionaire was a source of amusement among his employees.
meanings.sent4: His chintziness was like a shield, protecting his savings at all costs.
meanings.sent5: The chintziness of the old man was legendary in the small town.
